Subject: Re: Fury

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron leapt forward. "I am proud. My troops just have to much loyalty
this time around to let me die. You were never beating me." he accused
pointing at Unitron, reffering to how he had to strain himself not to
dodge the missile, and continue playing possom. Megatron stood and fixed
his gaze with Unitron. "You are mine." he said quietly, lifting his
arms, and letting a blast from his recoil cannon on his shoulder head
towards Unitron's feet. He then leapt towards Unitron, following his
blast.
